tool.name: Validate Affymetrix metadata

param.name: input
param.label: Affymetrix 96 well plate metadata file

validator.message: 96 well plate data must have 31 columns and no more than 96 lines of data

param.validator: value is not None and value.metadata.columns==31 and value.metadata.data_lines<=96

tool.help:
**What it does**
Validates an Affymetrix metadata file for 96 well plate data. These files consist of 31 columns and no more than 96 data lines. The tool will output the input file if it is valid. -----
**Required options**
